description.value:
A once-mighty Force Hammer long since corrupted irrecoverably. Wielder gains Baneful Presence (X), Daemonic (X), and Warp Instability Traits, where X = Willpower Bonus. If wielder already had the Daemonic Trait, they lose the Warp Instability Trait if they had it. Non-Daemonic wielders gain 1d10 Corruption every hour they wield the hammer, and non-daemonic characters within 10m of the hammer must make a -20 Willpower test per hour they remain within radius or also gain 1d10 corruption per Degree of Failiure. Wielder gains Command +30 skill, and Halo of Command Talent. Functions as a Nemesis Daemon Hammer with Tainted replacing Daemonbane Quality.

Requirements

Daemonic Remnants whose mere presence is a danger to all around it. To contain this relic one must slay its wielder and claim the weapon. It draws the attention of the Blood God.

Effect: Special

Notes: -
